name: Akrysolv® 2030 XS-60
description: Akrysolv® 2030 XS-60 is a acrylic resin used for Air-drying products for DIY Products, 2 K PUR systems for Metal Protection and Wood Protection. It is dedicated to the production of two-component polyurethane products and one-component acrylic enamels and paints. Compared to conventional alkyds, they feature better resistance and decorative properties. Their production is based on an optimized recipe, which allows us to obtain products with a high-performance quality, perfectly adapted to the needs and expectationsIt is dedicated to the production of two-component polyurethane products and one-component acrylic enamels and paints. Compared to conventional alkyds, they feature better resistance and decorative properties. Their production is based on an optimized recipe, which allows us to obtain products with a high-performance quality, perfectly adapted to the needs and expectations.
